Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click ‚ÄúAdd A Device‚Äù , then find ‚ÄúP42B‚Äù to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or‚ÄùOK‚Äù in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings ‚Üí Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Package:

1 x IP68 Waterproof Bluetooth Smart

1 x Charging Cable

1 x User Manual

1 x Screen Protector

Wwzzey 1.7” Touch Screen Buletooth Smart Watch

Multi-function Smartwatch Fitness Watch for Android/iOS Phone:

Screen: 1.7 inch HD Full touch screen

Dimension: L*W*H=43.5*36*11.0mm

Wristband Materials: Silicone + Stainless Steel

Wristband size: The band size is 20mm width;

Total length 255MM, adjustable length 155-235MM

Bluetooth version: Bluetooth 4.0

Don‚Äôt missing any notifications

After connecting the watch with your phone, you can get calls, receive SMS and APP messages (Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter…), calendar, weather and other smartphone app alerts, and you won’t miss any important information.

Ai Voice

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modesÔºö Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

„Äê2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch„ÄëWwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. Our bluetooth smartwatch come with fashionable appearance and comfortable silicone bracelet, fit your wrist well and more nicer and safety , easy to wear and take off, and you can adjust the length of the band. It is a ideal choice as a gift for men and womenin 2022.
„Äê1.7 inch Full Touch Screen & Customize Personalized Dial„ÄëHigh texture metal watch frame with 1.7-inch HD full touch screen and excellent image quality design brings you a better user experience. And our smartwatch has more than 150+ different watch faces, you can choose different dials from APP’s market according to festival, your mood or clothes. And you can also customize your watch faces with your personal photos, new look for everyday.
„ÄêPush Real-time Information to Your Wrist„ÄëThe smart watch with bluetooth call can connect to iOS8.0 and Android4.4 phone via Bluetooth 4.0, and you can answer or dial calls anywhere, and get calendar, weather and SNS (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Twitter,etc.) notifications on display. It will be very practical when you are unconvenient to take your phone out or you don’t want to miss anything important.
„ÄêMultifunctional Health Tracking„ÄëThis fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
„ÄêIP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models„ÄëOur health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.
„Äê100% SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE„ÄëYou can easily learn how to use it by following our user instructions. Wwzzey offers 7×24 hours customer service and 12 moths after-sales service, support for replacement, and refund. Pls feel free to contact us if you have any issues. As a professional seller on Amazon, we are confident that we will not disappoint you.

Wwzzey is a professional brand for smartwatch. Bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer and make everyone healthier!
